name: Playpen
description: Playpen. Family is a household of 4, consisting of the client, her husband and their two young children (ages 1 and 2), currently residing in a rental flat. Husband is still amid his National Service. The client is unable to work due the caregiving needs of her two young children.  The client has difficulties juggling the high supervision needs of her young children whilst managing the household chores. A playpen would really benefit in ensuring the children are placed in a safe space while the client is occupied in other household matters. However, as the family’s sole income is derived from husband’s National Service salary, it is insufficient for them to afford one and hence, are seeking the support from a kind donor for one.

contact.org: MWS Covenant Family Service Centre – Hougang and Buangkok
contact.name: Sabrina Than

passiton.name: Baby Playpen
passiton.description: Lightly used playpen for my nephews and nieces. Playpen is in good condition, used for 2 years.

name: Washing Machine
description: Family, consists of parents and four young children (aged 6 months to 4 years), is facing financial difficulties. They currently reside in a 1-room HDB rental flat. The father is unable to work due to spinal issues, as supported by a doctor’s memo, while the mother serves as the primary caregiver. They are in the midst of moving to a 2-room flat and need assistance with their refurbishment. The family is unable to afford on expenses on the appliances due to their financial constraints. Your support would greatly help them during this challenging period.

contact.org: Montfort Care - Kreta Ayer Family Services
contact.name: Kelly Lim

passiton.name: Mini washing machine
passiton.description: This is a new mini washing machine, used once. Do take note that this mini washing machine is only suitable to wash some clothings, not meant for heavy loads as it is a 1.5kg washer. Need to manually fill in water (hose provided with the machine) and need to drain off water by letting the hose down. Comes with basic wash and spin function(manually start the spin function after the washing stops). Make sure there is a power socket nearby where you will be placing the mini washing machine(ideally wet area where you can drain off the water and fill in water easily). It is portable- light enough to shift it around.
